name: Candy Explorer
description:
My idea was to create a walk simulater, collecting Candies with various effects based on Candy Crush's power ups, but I was busy until Monday afternoon. 

You have to collect four of the the same candy to slowly bring colour back to the world. Some of the CC power ups would unlock more spaces or show more of the place space, which inspired this idea.

The world is procedually generated so will be different each time you play
